description: [Status: stable] [Name: django-raw-sql] [Message: Use of RawSQL can lead to SQL injection vulnerabilities] What it does Checks for uses of Django's RawSQL function. Why is this bad? Django's RawSQL function can be used to execute arbitrary SQL queries, which can in turn lead to SQL injection vulnerabilities. Example from django.db.models.expressions import RawSQL from django.contrib.auth.models import User User.objects.annotate(val=RawSQL("%s" % input_param, []))
